name: part_010
file: tmp_【お誕生日】BirthdayLive2021【＃ときのそら誕生日2021】 [lXdX1S1-Mxc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora speaks to the audience, thanking them for the stars and introducing the final song.
Tokino Sora performs her new song 'KumoHurray!'.
End credits screen showing the special guests of the live performance.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: えっと、
subtitles.english: Um,

subtitles.original: わぁ、星！
subtitles.english: Wow, stars!

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとう、みんな。
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you, everyone.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、21時から、
subtitles.english: So, from 9 PM,

subtitles.original: えー、
subtitles.english: uh,

subtitles.original: ずっとみんな見て待ってもらえれば嬉しいなと思います。
subtitles.english: I hope you'll all watch and wait for it.

subtitles.original: そして、そしてそしてそして！
subtitles.english: And, and and and!

subtitles.original: 次歌う曲えー、はですね、
subtitles.english: The next song I'm going to sing...

subtitles.original: その2曲のうちの「KumoHurray!」の方を歌わせていただきます。
subtitles.english: ...is "KumoHurray!" from those two songs.

subtitles.original: こちらの方はですね、えー、掛け声がすごいいっぱいになっています。
subtitles.english: This one has a lot of call-and-response.

subtitles.original: 今日初めて歌うので何とも言えないと思うんですけど、
subtitles.english: It's my first time singing it today, so I'm not sure,

subtitles.original: 掛け声気づいたらなんか、なんかコメントしてもらえたらとっても嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: but I'd be very happy if you could comment if you notice the calls.

subtitles.original: すごい難しい曲なので頑張って歌います！
subtitles.english: It's a very difficult song, so I'll do my best to sing it!

subtitles.original: それでは、もう最後の曲いっちゃって大丈夫ですかね？
subtitles.english: Now, is it okay to move on to the last song?

subtitles.original: 最後の曲、いこうと思います。
subtitles.english: I'm going to do the last song.

subtitles.original: 今日初公開させていただきます、
subtitles.english: Making its debut today,

subtitles.original: KumoHurray!
subtitles.english: KumoHurray!

subtitles.original: KumoHurray! 作詞：ときのそら 作曲・編曲：赤ティン
subtitles.english: KumoHurray! Lyrics: Tokino Sora, Composition/Arrangement: Akatin

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: 空へ進め
subtitles.english: Advance to the sky

subtitles.original: この曲いっぱい掛け声あるので、一緒にやっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: There are a lot of calls in this song, so let's do it together!

subtitles.original: フワフワとリズムに合わせて
subtitles.english: Move fluffy to the rhythm

subtitles.original: ステップ踏んでこうどこまでも
subtitles.english: Let's step forward to anywhere

subtitles.original: ほら羽ばたいていけそう
subtitles.english: Look, I feel like I can take flight

subtitles.original: さあ 助走期 ワクワク
subtitles.english: Now, the approach phase, exciting

subtitles.original: 胸が高鳴るよ
subtitles.english: My heart is racing

subtitles.original: この思いはもう止まらない
subtitles.english: These feelings won't stop anymore

subtitles.original: みんな元気に行こうよ
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's go energetically

subtitles.original: 大きな声出してさ 叫ぼう
subtitles.english: Raise your voice and shout

subtitles.original: 心が軽くなっていくからさ
subtitles.english: Because your heart will get lighter

subtitles.original: 君の心は 曇りのち晴れ渡って
subtitles.english: Your heart will clear up after the clouds

subtitles.original: 虹をかけるよ
subtitles.english: And form a rainbow

subtitles.original: 胸を張って 今を進もう
subtitles.english: Hold your head high and advance through the now

subtitles.original: 星のように 輝いて
subtitles.english: Shine like a star

subtitles.original: 呼吸合わせて 気持ち呼んでこう
subtitles.english: Sync our breaths and call out our feelings

subtitles.original: いたずらをし合えたらいいよね
subtitles.english: It'd be nice if we could play pranks on each other

subtitles.original: ちょっと下手だね 嘘だよ
subtitles.english: You're a bit bad at it, just kidding

subtitles.original: 些細な会話で 私たちは今
subtitles.english: Through trivial conversations, we are now

subtitles.original: 分かり合おう
subtitles.english: Understanding each other

subtitles.original: 超えていこう あの時の空よりも
subtitles.english: Let's go beyond, further than the sky of that time

subtitles.original: もっと遠くまで
subtitles.english: To somewhere even further

subtitles.original: みんなほっとけないからね
subtitles.english: Because I can't leave anyone behind

subtitles.original: さあ 止まらないで
subtitles.english: Now, don't stop

subtitles.original: 上の空にならないで
subtitles.english: Don't be absent-minded

subtitles.original: 歩けたなら ゆっくりでも道はできる
subtitles.english: If you can walk, even slowly, a path will be made

subtitles.original: 夢の色 描いて
subtitles.english: Draw the colors of your dreams

subtitles.original: みんな！今日はお誕生日お祝いしてくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for celebrating my birthday today!

subtitles.original: すっごい楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 曇りがちな気分も
subtitles.english: Even when you feel cloudy

subtitles.original: ちょっと目線を変えたのなら
subtitles.english: If you change your perspective a bit

subtitles.original: 心はればれ
subtitles.english: Your heart will be clear and bright

subtitles.original: あの子になれるかもよ
subtitles.english: Maybe you can become that person

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないよ
subtitles.english: You're not alone,

subtitles.original: 不安になったらここに来ればいいよ
subtitles.english: if you feel anxious, just come here

subtitles.original: 私はずっと待っているからね
subtitles.english: Because I'll always be waiting

subtitles.original: 負けてもいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to lose,

subtitles.original: 頑張ってきたことは無駄じゃないから
subtitles.english: what you've worked hard for isn't in vain

subtitles.original: 胸を張って 今を生きよう
subtitles.english: Hold your head high and live in the now

subtitles.original: 星のように 輝いて
subtitles.english: Shine like a star

subtitles.original: みんな！最後もいくよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Let's go for the end too!

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: 空へ進め
subtitles.english: Advance to the sky

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Birthday Live 2021
subtitles.english: Birthday Live 2021

subtitles.original: Special Guest: AZKi, Hoshimachi Suisei,
subtitles.english: Special Guest: AZKi, Hoshimachi Suisei,

subtitles.original: Inugami Korone, Akai Haato, 夜空メル
subtitles.english: Inugami Korone, Akai Haato, Yozora Mel
